document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2010-10
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING SECTION 3.24.030 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE CONCERNING AN INCREASE IN THE EXISTING TAX RATE ON TRANSIENT OCCUPANCY ("HOTEL VISITOR'S TAX") FROM 10% TO 12%
